languageKey.label: Title of the Typoscript Element
Define the view

On this TAB you enter
  • Calendar: Show Calendar for one ore more Product IDs
  • Availability Form: Show Form to Check the Availability
  • Booking: Form for entering the user data and to do the booking.
Select the products you want to be used in this plugin.
If you don't see any products to select in the right box, you first have to enter the storage pid and you have to add products, prices and seasons into this storage folder.
Define the view
